stanza.line: Two loves I have of comfort and despairdespair
Which like two spirits do suggest me stillstill
The better angel is a man right fairfair
The worser spirit a woman coloured illill
To win me soon to hell my female evilevil
Tempteth my better angel from my sideside
And would corrupt my saint to be a devildevil
Wooing his purity with her foul pridepride
And whether that my angel be turned fiendfiend
Suspect I may yet not directly telltell
But being both from me both to each friendfriend
I guess one angel in another hellhell
Yet this shall I neer know but live in doubtdoubt
Till my bad angel fire my good one outout
